mainText:
Bank of Entitlement Promo: "Get VIP treatment and unlimited overdrafts at Bank of Entitlement - where your every whim is our command! Join now and experience the luxury of never having to worry about financial responsibility again! 

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, let me tell you about the time I demanded a bank to open just for me because I was simply too important to wait in line like common folks. I strutted in at 11:59 PM, banging on the doors, demanding to be let in immediately. When the manager tried to explain that the bank was closed, I went into a full-on tantrum, screaming about my rights as a valued customer and how dare they inconvenience me. The manager, clearly intimidated by my presence, caved in and opened the doors just for me. As I strolled in triumphantly, I smirked at all the plebeians outside who didn't have the same level of importance as I did. And that, my friends, is how you assert your entitlement and get what you want. Just another day in the life of Hot Josh, where everything revolves around me!"
